/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and details of the scene.
